Literature.Title: Total structures and antimicrobial activity of bacitracin minor components.
Literature.Author: Ikai Y, Oka H, Hayakawa J, Matsumoto M, Saito M, Harada K, Mayumi Y, Suzuki M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=0.78µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=25µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(no activity data),Escherichia coli IFO 3806(no activity data)
